x-codeSamples.label: javascript Axios

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: context-type-quantity
parameters.description: A use context type and quantity- or range-based value assigned to the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The effect evidence synthesis publication date

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: effective
parameters.description: The time during which the effect evidence synthesis is intended to be in use

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the effect evidence synthesis

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the effect evidence synthesis
